column4: it only calmed my frustration.  I found a great painmanagement doctor and am using it with .1 mg of clonidine per 25 mg Nortryptyline and it works better than the pain medicine.  I tried elavil and the side effects were too much
column6: these are the best drugs for treating nociceptive pain.  The clonidine is essential for these medicines to work right.  My Pain Managment Doctor is also having me take 5000 IU D-3 per day.  You can google NOW FOODS and buy them cheap
